EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder - Your PCI DSS Compliance Renewal Request - {!Account.IATACode__c} - {!Account.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
IATA Code: {!Account.IATACode__c}
This is a friendly reminder that the documentation for your Compliance with PCI DSS security standards renewal has not been received yet. If you have submitted the evidence already, please disregard this message.
We would like to highlight that the submission deadline date is {!TODAY()+15} (mm/dd/yyyy).
If you want to learn more about PCI DSS compliance, please visit our web page: http://www.iata.org/services/finance/Pages/pci-dss.aspx
Should you need any further information from IATA, please do not hesitate to login a new query via our Customer Portal:
http://www.iata.org/cs
Yours sincerely,
Agency Management International Air Transport Association ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- In order to obtain information or assistance from IATA, do not hesitate to access at any time our Customer Portal
